title: i'm fine with longer queue times
body:
I'd rather wait an extra 5-10 minutes for a support.. than spend the next 20+ minutes because of some ass hole who got auto-filled and is "entitled" to not play his role.

DMTryp:  dude
DMTryp:  pick your role
DMTryp:  correctly
MK Prodigy:  i only adc
MK Prodigy:  sorry
MK Prodigy:  it filled me sup
DMTryp:  you're reported sorry
MK Prodigy:  its cool
MK Prodigy:  i dont mind

and as you can see... He's not afraid of anything... "can't get in trouble for off meta picks" ... that's bullshit. 
I think we have 3 options here.. 
1. Longer queues but better quality games..
2. Ban these "entitled" dipshits
3. Ruin lives and do nothing

I wouldn't normally bitch but this is like 2-5 times everyday.

replies.body: So lets go back to the old ranked system. First pick can enjoy to pick every role he wants and last pick is most likely 100% support.
in my deepest, honest opinion, that system was the most respected. But that is just me and I don't mind the new system
Autofill; considerate in concept, a horrible, trollish mess in practice.
Most people won't wait to wait an extra 5-10 minutes for a support, though.
I've been saying this for the whole year. Even if they change it, it won't be until next season. Like we had to endure the fucking dynamic q for a year.
It's what happens when Riot cater to the high elos because they cry about "queue time". Now they got what they want, they cry about autofill.

I feel the same way.  I'd rather wait longer to get the role I want and I know I am good at while at the same time being matched with teammates who have the same deal than having someone get dumped into a role they not only aren't good at, but outright hate.  

I can see autofill being used at least in normals, but it's hard enough to climb in ranked as it is.  At least ensure I can always get the roles I'm best at.

Sounds about right....

If I had the potential to get a great top laner, but have to wait 20-30 minutes, I would sit my ass down and wait. Would prefer that than a toplaner who has no idea what they're doing

I can agree with you there. Ive been running into alot of trolls, who just want to ruin the game for everyone else. So youre either forced to dodge the game or take a surrender at 20 and lose so much LP....
